page.title: 20The Doctor's Surgery
page.content: One day I went to Doctor Bell's surgery. I like Doctor Bell he is a nice man to go to. Doctor Bell lives in a big house, he has a surgery at his house. I was sick and Doctor Bell gave me some medicine. It was Saturday, he is at work on Saturdays. You can go in one of the rooms to talk to him. I went to Doctor Bell's and at first I thought the injection was not going to hurt but it did, and I cried and he let me take the needle home. When I got home I played with it with Julie, Joanne and Louise. When you go in the surgery you see a long seat at the left side and there is a long seat at the right side and you have to wait a long time. He has an owl on his desk and it blinks at you and once he tickled me.
